A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie isn't perfect but it makes up for a convoluted plot with characters I truly liked & visually it's just mind blowing in every way. I enjoyed it and so did my kids. It got a little bogged down in the middle but the beginning and ending battle scenes were amazing. This was obviously a movie that sacrificed character exploration to be more visual in order to make this for the masses. I think the movie succeeds in being beautifully futuristic looking & entertains at a high level. Nostalgic and still hopeful & forward looking.
